function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of personnel to monitor protocol compliance","Impact":"Increased risk of protocol non-compliance and potential disease spread","Mitigation":"Utilize technology for remote monitoring and enforcement of protocols, increase personnel resources","Technologies":"Remote surveillance, automated monitoring systems","People":"Park visitors, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Public company in charge of parks"},{"Description":"Insufficient communication and awareness","Impact":"Potential lack of information leading to non-compliance with protocols","Mitigation":"Implement targeted social media campaigns, provide clear signage and instructions at park entrances","Technologies":"Social media platforms, digital signage systems","People":"Park visitors, general public","Owner":"Public company in charge of parks"},{"Description":"Non-compliance with protocol by park visitors","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within park environment","Mitigation":"Implement strict enforcement measures, increase public awareness of the importance of protocol compliance","Technologies":"Enforcement personnel, public awareness campaigns","People":"Park visitors, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Public company in charge of parks"}]}
